FINE FOOD
 

Wayfinder Beer is a purveyor of fine American Craft Beer & food. 

WAYFINDER BEER is a new brewery project in Portland, Oregon. We have transformed 8,900 square feet of a century-old brick warehouse in Portland's Central Eastside into a classic destination for beer and food lovers.

Wayfinder is the brainchild of Charlie Devereux (co-founder of Double Mountain Brewery), Matthew Jacobson (co-founder/owner of Sizzle Pie, Quality Bar, and Relapse Records) and Rodney Muirhead (co-founder/owner of Podnah's Pit and La Taq). Our mission: to bring simple and authentic pleasures of the highest quality to the Rose City and beyond.

Guests to Wayfinder will find enjoyment in our 110-seat taphall, or outside on our 2000 square-foot deck with a fire pit?. Our menu of handcrafted comfort food will feature deliciousness from a custom wood-fired grill. We'll use our four-vessel, 10-barrel brewhouse to create world-class lagers and ales for onsite enjoyment and wholesale distribution. We hope you dig it!

Check out our upcoming blog or social media pages for the latest scoop. Join our email list and we'll send newsletters and such. 

CONNECT ON SOCIAL MEDIA
 
ANDECHS VOLLBIER HELLES LAGER
Beautifully malty, immensely drinkable Bavarian lager
(ABV 4.8% | IBU 20)
FRÜH KÖLSCH GERMAN ALE
Top fermented and delicate, drinkable with an unsurpassed balance. pale gold with a good lasting head
(ABV 4.8% | IBU 19)
WAYFINDER/PINTS DARK ERA - OATMEAL STOUT
Bucketfulls of oats and shadowy roasted barley usher in this sun-sucking brew.
(ABV 6.6% | IBU 26)
WEIHENSTEPHAN HEFEWEISSEBIER GERMAN HEFEWEIZEN
Golden-yellow wheat beer, aroma of cloves and a refreshing banana flavor, bright effervescence.
(ABV 5.4% | IBU 14)
WAYFINDER/OCCIDENTAL VIENNA LAGER
Made famous by Anton Dreher in the 1840's, this coppery, toasty beer focuses on balance and drinkablilty
(ABV 5.5% | IBU 22)
SPATEN OPTIMATOR DOPPELBOCK LAGER
Bottom fermented dark "double bock" beer with a rich, roasted flavor
(ABV 7.5% | IBU 25)
WAYFINDER/ECLIPTIC STARFINDER WIT
Brewed with unmalted wheat, spiced with coriander and orangepeel, with a nose of banana and fruit
(ABV 6.1% | IBU 30)
WAYFINDER/ROSS ISLAND MOVING THE GOALPOSTS IPA
Dry, golden and hoppy. a celebratory ipa suited for changing deadlines and late work days.
(ABV 6.5% | IBU 75)
BRASSERIE DUPONT CUVEE DRY HOPPING SAISON
Coppery, blond beer, dry and refreshing with sustained bitterness. limited release.
(ABV 6.5% | IBU 43)
EVIL TWIN BISCOTTI BREAK IMPERIAL STOUT
Pitch black and deep. Coffee, toffee, aged cherry and roast. A wonderful dessert.
(ABV 11.5% | IBU 35)
WAYFINDER/ZOIGLHAUS GSD IPA
Back again is our take on a NW IPA, loads of Chinook, Cascade and Centennial hops. Goodbye sober day!
(ABV 7.0% | IBU 75)
WAYFINDER/ZOIGLHAUS LANDBIER LAGER
A rustic, country version of a refined helles, a touch darker, maltier and hoppier. Satisfying and moreish.
(ABV 5.1% | IBU 24)
KÖSTRITZER SCHWARZBIER BLACK LAGER
Dry and herbal, with a dark mahogony color. Finishes with bitter chocolate and fresh bread.
(ABV 4.8% | IBU 27)
PFRIEM TRIPLE IPA
Three times the amount of hops and malt, brimming with flavors of peaches and cream, strawberries, ripe citrus.
(ABV 10.5% | IBU 105)
WAYFINDER/HOPWORKS TINY BUBBLES - GERMAN PILS
Back by popular demand! Classic, sessionable and sharp. Brilliantly yellow and refreshing pilsner.
(ABV 8.1% | IBU 76)
CIDER RIOT! EVERYBODY POGO HOPPED CIDER
Fantastic dry cider from our local buds.
(ABV 6.7%)
